page.title: 06PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: To play 'hopscotch' you need to draw some squares with numbers in.You have a little b;ock of wood,throw it into a square and push it to another square with your foot.Then you hop into that square then do it to all the other numbers until the last one. Sometimes in the playground we play with a skipping rope.People twine the skipping rope.Someone jumps over it when it touches the ground.If you don't jump over it you're out. We also play'farmers in his den'.You need a circle of children.One in the middle is the farmer.We walk round and sing'the farmer wants a wife'.When we stop the farmer chooses someone.Then we walk and sing again.The wife chooses a baby.Then the baby gets a nurse and she gets a dog then everyone pats the dog.
